title: Blaze
description: “Kira gulped, unable to stop the growing sense that everything in her world was about to change.” With Aldrich’s note burning a hole in her pocket, Kira is off to England to finally reunite with her birth mother. But what begins as a dream quickly turns to a nightmare and Kira is left questioning everything she has ever known. Can she be the conduit Luke wants her to be? Can she be the rebel Tristan needs her to be? Or is she something else? Something no one, not even Aldrich, ever saw coming…Blaze is the third book in the thrilling Midnight Fire Series. It is approximately 65,000 words.
author: Kaitlyn Davis
